alert.note: Alert for Darlington; Dillon; Marlboro (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 6:08PM EDT until June 16 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Dillon County in northeastern South Carolina... Darlington County in northeastern South Carolina... Marlboro County in northeastern South Carolina... * Until 715 PM EDT. * At 608 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Cheraw Municipal Airport to near Cassatt, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Bennettsville, Hartsville, Darlington, Mccoll, Lamar, Clio, Mont Clare, Brownsville, Lydia, Darlington Raceway, Swift Creek, Oats, Chavistown, Floyd, Minturn, North Hartsville, Dovesville, Auburn, Wallace and Clyde. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
